article_title: Dallas police looking for 75-year-old man last seen in Downtown Dallas
article_text:
Dallas police are asking for the public’s help finding a 75-year-old man who was last seen in Downtown Dallas.

Rex Donald Prater was last seen attending services at the First Baptist Church in the 1700 block of San Jacinto Street, police said.

Prater has high blood pressure, but no other known medical conditions.

Prater is a 5-foot-8 white man, about 155 pounds, with green eyes and white or gray hair, police said.

Anyone who sees Prater or knows his whereabouts is asked to call 911 or Dallas police at 214-671-4268.
